title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: From maker OneNattyLitecoin comes one of their great silver VIA coin sets:#018/100 3x coin set comes with COA/envelope as seen25 VIA - antique silver 1oz50 VIA - antique silver/gilt 1oz100 VIA - antique gold plated silver 1ozSTARTING BID: 0.0050BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0003BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JULY 29th, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
